data.title: WOLC Radio Advertising Costs
data.meta_description: How much does it cost to advertise on WOLC-FM. Find radio advertising rates for WOLC-FM in Maryland.
data.text:
Need advertising rates for WOLC-FM? We've got the latest radio ad rates from WOLC-FM.

Why Advertise on WOLC?

The WOLC-FM radio station has a large listening audience in the Salisbury, MD area that may be interested in your products and services. It is owned by Marantha, Inc. The radio station format is Christian talk and music. To hear WOLC, turn your dial to 102.5 FM.

Radio Ad Prices for WOLC-FM

The radio station's estimated ad rate is $25.00. Note: Individual radio station rates are not readily available. Our estimates are based on regional averages and may be very inaccurate. Advertising rate estimates are typically for a 30 second spot. Seasonal factors and volume discounts should also be considered. Contact the radio station's advertising department for an exact quote on their current rates. In some cases, our estimated rates may be significantly different from the actual current rates...so be sure to get your ad prices from the station before completing your budgeting.

For more advertising rate information, or to purchase an ad, please contact the advertising department at (410) 543-9652.

WOLC-FM Contact Information

WOLC-FM

11890 Crisfield Lane

Princess Anne, MD

Phone: (410) 543-9652

Fax: (410) 651-9652

To update or correct radio advertising information on this page, please use the link below:
